comments.author: jborean93
comments.body:
How are you activating the venv, if in PowerShell make sure you run the `activate.ps1` script and not just `activate`.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8462645/160687844-8c2817a6-43d0-412a-9f8e-2c68187a0a06.png)

The `activate` file is a batch script so it will run in a cmd subprocess and not affect the PowerShell one, using `activate.ps1` will run in the current PowerShell process allowing it to set what is needed.
